price: 154. Ha ka odhannina kuwa lagu dilo jidka Alle waa meyd; mayee way nool yihiin, waydaanse dareemeyn.
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولُواْ لِمَن يُقۡتَلُ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَمۡوَٰتُۢۚ بَلۡ أَحۡيَآءٞ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā taqūlū liman yuq'talu fī sabīli al-lahi amwātun bal aḥyāon walākin lā tashʿurūna
